title: Invoice financing/factoring confirmations
dataVerified: Seller, buyer, invoice amount, advance rate, fees, factor
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents invoice fraud (double-financing same invoice). Domain binding verifies factoring company. Tamper-evident advance terms. Prevents duplicate invoice submissions. Supply chain finance integrity. Working capital verification.
